column5: @CombinedProcessIndex specifies the zero based indices of individual processes within the complete list of XJDF/@Types that this ResourceSet SHALL apply to. Multiple entries in @CombinedProcessIndex specify that the ResourceSet is used by the respective multiple processes.
URL to an external, human-readable description of the ResourceSet.
Human-readable descriptive name of the ResourceSet.
@Name SHALL specify the name of the explicit resource that this ResourceSet represents.
@ProcessUsage identifies the context of a Resource if multiple Resource elements of the same type are supplied for an individual process type.
Unit of measurement for the values of AmountPool/PartAmount/@Amount, AmountPool/PartAmount/@MaxAmount, AmountPool/PartAmount/ @MinAmount and AmountPool/PartAmount/@Waste.
@Usage shows that the resource is either consumed or produced within this XJDF document.
Any human-readable text that relates to the ResourceSet.

Reference to an XJDF that produces this ResourceSet[@Usage=”Input”] or consumes this ResourceSet[@Usage=”Output”]. Multiple Dependent elements specify that the Dependent relates to multiple consuming or producing processes.
Additional identifiers related to the ResourceSet.
